DOC.brief_summary: This study compare cardiac safety inhale indacaterol placebo oral moxifloxacin .
DOC.criteria: Healthy , nonsmoking Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.532 kg/m2 Body weight least 50 kg Recent/concurrent use concomitant medication ( except acetaminophen ) Recent participation clinical trial Recent donation loss blood History/presence range medical condition , include electrocardiographic ( ECG ) abnormality , diabetes mellitus , hyperthyroidism impair renal function Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
